title: MTV faces
overview: MTV faces is the brand's short-form digital series that tackles important, under-discussed topics. After a successful debut focusing on grief, the upcoming series will be hosted by Jordan Stephens and address ADHD. Alongside celebrity guests such as Matt Willis, Cat Burns, Jessie Mei Lei, Wes Nelson and Rizzle Kicks bandmate Harvey Sylvester, Jordan will delve into personal experiences with ADHD, aiming to break down misconceptions about the condition.
